sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"沉浸，浸入"之意。
means: immerse ： 侧重全部被液体所覆盖，也可用于比喻意义。
dip ： 指部分地、暂时地或轻微地放进液体，多暗示一种谨慎或试探性的动作。
duck ： 指把头伸进水中，或指游泳时开玩笑地把一个人的头按入水中。
plunge ： 暗示迅速而有力的动作，但浸入不一定很深。
submerge ： 指长时间的完全浸入、潜入，强调浸入液体深层。

sentence.Network_en: Breaking the dam could submerge downstream cities such as Wuhan.
sentence.Network_cn: 摧毁大坝可能会淹没下游城市，比如武汉。

sentence.Network_en: The waters were rising about the rock and would soon submerge it.
sentence.Network_cn: 水快涨到跟岩石一样高了，很快就会淹没它。

sentence.Network_en: Hippos are unable to submerge in the few remaining water holes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在仅剩的几个水坑里，河马根本无法没入水中。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 汩字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 弄乱;扰乱〖 disorder〗 淹没;湮灭〖 submerge;flood〗 疾行〖 rapid〗.
新概念英语第三册单词总汇　 - 豆丁网 ... plunge 跳入(与 submerge 浸没，淹没 emerge 出现.
690个英语四级高频词汇 ... lynar a. 月的，月球的 625. submerge vi. 潜入水中 626. timber n. 木材，原木 628.
仿声词根和谐音词 - 3416129的日志 - 网易博客 ... merge 合并、吞入、突入- submerge 淹没，潜水- immerge 投入，埋头-.

list.abs: 农业词汇英语翻译(O-T) ... submerged culture 深层培养 submerged fermentation 深层发酵 submerged leaf 沉水叶.
submerged leaf 沉水叶submerged plant 水底植物submerged weir 潜堰
钻井平台英语(石油专业英语) - 豆丁网 ... rod pump 拉杆油泵 submerged pump 潜水泵 bridge plug 桥塞.
submerged non-free jet 淹没非自由射流submerged pipeline 海底管线submerged production system 水下采油系统

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin submergere, from sub- 'under' + mergere 'to dip'

entry.tran: (使)浸没;(使)淹没;(使)潜入水中;(使)没入水中
entry.def: If something submerges or if you submerge it, it goes below the surface of some water or another liquid.

example.ex: Hippos are unable to submerge in the few remaining water holes...
example.tran: 在仅剩的几个水坑里，河马根本无法没入水中。

example.ex: The river burst its banks, submerging an entire village.
example.tran: 河水决堤，淹没了整个村庄。

entry.def: If you submerge yourself in an activity, you give all your attention to it and do not think about anything else.

example.ex: He submerges himself in the world of his imagination.
example.tran: 他沉浸在自己想象的世界中。

means.word_mean: 1. sink below the surface; go under or as if under water
4. fill or cover completely, usually with water

auth_sentence.content: It could be enough to submerge many island nations.
auth_sentence.res_content: It could be enough to submerge many island nations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It could be enough to submerge many island nations.

auth_sentence.content: Submerge the potato strands into the melted butter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Submerge the potato strands into the melted butter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Submerge the potato strands into the melted butter.

auth_sentence.content: Drain eggs and submerge in cold water for a few minutes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Drain eggs and submerge in cold water for a few minutes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Drain eggs and submerge in cold water for a few minutes.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"接近,靠近"; 2. 在后面;再; 3. 表示"在下面,次一等,副手"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub接近,靠近+acid酸→adj.略酸的
sub接近,靠近+adult成年人→adj.接近成年的
sub接近,靠近+arctic北极的→adj.近北极的
sub接近,靠近+arid干燥的→adj.有点干燥的
sub接近,靠近+central中心的→adj.接近中心的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+limin门槛+al……的→在门槛下→在意识之下→潜意识的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+miss放+ive……的→放下面→恭顺的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+terr地+anean→地下的
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+area区域→n.分区
sub在下面,次一等,副手+branch枝, 分枝, 分部→n.小分支;支[分]店;分公司

stems_affixes.value_cn: 副助理监督, 副助理主教
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub在下面,次一等,副手+dean教长→n.副助理监督, 副助理主教
sub在下面,次一等,副手+editor编辑→n.助理编辑
sub在下面,次一等,副手+head标题→n.小标题, 副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+office办公室→n.分办事处
sub在下面,次一等,副手+officer官员→n.下级军官
sub在下面,次一等,副手+title标题→n.副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+tropic热带+s→亚热带
sub下面+way道路→n.地道,地铁
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+due债务,义务→减轻
sub在下面,次一等,副手+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压
sub在下面,次一等,副手+merg沉没+e→淹没下去
sub在下面,次一等,副手+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂
sub在下面,次一等,副手+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字→订购
sub在下面,次一等,副手+side坐→坐下去→平息
sub在下面,次一等,副手+vert转→转下去→推翻

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧急的, 浮现的, 突然出现的, 自然发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: emerge[v.浮现]+ent表形容词→突然出现的→紧急的
emerge[v.浮现]+ence表名词→emergence出现

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧急情况,突然事件,非常时刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: emerge[v.浮现]+ency表名词→突然出现的事情
e出+merg投入;淹没+e→淹没的东西出现→浮现
im进入+merg沉,没+e→沉进去→沉入
merg沉,没+e→沉下→融为一体→合并
sub在下面+merg淹没+e→淹没下去

Sentence.sentence: The whole Antarctic region will be submerged.

sentences.en: The submarine can submerge very quickly.
sentences.cn: 潜艇能非常迅速地潜入水中。

sentences.en: The river overflowed and submerged the farmland.
sentences.cn: 河水泛滥, 淹没了农田。

sentences.en: His talent was submerged by his shyness.
sentences.cn: 他的腼腆埋没了他的才华。

jushi.chinese: 潜水艇能快速地潜入水中。

jushi.english: The crocodile submerged when it saw the boat.
jushi.chinese: 鳄鱼一看见小船就潜入水中。

jushi.english: I watched a school whales gradually submerging.
jushi.chinese: 我看着鲸群慢慢潜入水中。
